Text.Page:
My research partner, Aresk, and I are studying these relics. Unfortunately, we had a bit of a tiff and he stormed off. The desert is too dangerous to handle alone.

I need you to check out the ruins and see if he's sulking there. Bring him back alive, please!

Hmph. Ladya sent you? I tried so hard to avoid the kulkari that I completely forgot about what we were fighting about.

Thanks for coming after me. I'll make a few notes, then head back.
